item.title: Stumbling into Quay: Upgrading from 3.3 to 3.4 with the quay-operator
item.description: We had the task of answering various questions related to upgrading Red Hat Quay 3.3 to 3.4 and to 3.5 with the help of the quay-operator. Thankfully (sic!) everything changed in regards to the Quay operator between Quay 3.3 and Quay 3.4. So this is a brain dump of the things to consider. Operator changes With Quay 3.4 the operator was completely reworked and it basically changed from opinionated to very opinionated.
